score: 12 out of 21 people found the following review useful
review: vanilla sky is one of the worst movies i have ever seen and I watched batman and robin and I watched hellraiser 5 and i have watched spider man 3. This movie is crap for the first time in my movie watching experience i can say i was honestly confused. I cant tell you what was going on i watched this movie three times and every time the confusion got worse and worse. Who is tom cruise really in love with Cameron diaz or the other girl. Is Kurt Russel real or not. I don't know what is going on. I don't even know why i even reviewed this im so confused about what i watched that i don't know how to review it. Someone please explain this movie to me.
